# remove(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes the specified rule list from the content controller object.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func remove(_ contentRuleList: WKContentRuleList)
```

## Parameters

- **contentRuleList**: The rule list to remove.

## Discussion

This method removes the rule list only from the user content controller object. You can still access the rule list from the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKContentRuleListStore] object you used to create it.

## Adding and Removing Content Rules

- **add(_:)**: Adds the specified content rule list to the content controller object.
- **removeAllContentRuleLists()**: Removes all rules lists from the content controller.
- **WKContentRuleList**: A compiled list of rules to apply to web content.
